title: [Abandoned Farm, Outhouse]
description: Long neglected, the wood-frame is rotting and partially collapsed.  The smell of decaying organic matter is heavy in the small enclosed space.  In between the gaps in the walls, one can see the snow-covered yard.  At least, it's warm inside the building.
